title: Emilia Clarke looks radiant in a pale blue co-ord for Last Christmas photocall
text:
She recently revealed suffering two brain aneurysms helped her resonate with her character in Last Christmas.

And Emilia Clarke looked happy and healthy as she posed up a storm at the photo call for her latest film, Last Christmas, on Tuesday.

The Game Of Thrones star, 32, wore a pale blue co-ord that echoed the snowy billboard behind her at the event in Berlin, Germany.

Radiant: Emilia Clarke looked happy and healthy as she posed up a storm at the photo call for her latest film, Last Christmas, in Berlin on Tuesday

She chose a cosy Christmas-themed ensemble for the red carpet event, cinching in her tiny waist with a matching belt.

Accessorising the blue two piece with a pair of nude heels she posed with one hand on her hip.

Her long-sleeved top featured buttons down the front and a diagonal ruched pattern was visible in the fabric.

Candid: Emilia recently revealed suffering two brain aneurysms helped her resonate with her character in Last Christmas

Snowy: She wore a cosy Christmas-themed ensemble as she hit the red carpet, cinching in her tiny waist with a matching belt

The matching skirt reached the actress' ankles and offered a stylish slit down the front.

She styled her brunette tresses in short curls and added a dazzling red lip.

Speaking to Stella magazine, the brunette said she resonated with her character Kate in the film, who is a woman also recovering from a life-threatening illness.

Chic: Emilia's long-sleeved top featured buttons down the front and a ruched diagonal pattern was visible in the fabric

'It was uncanny reading the script because it’s my life at this point,' she said.

'I have the benefit of having space between myself and my sickness and what you see through Kate is the fear of what happens when your body fails you in some way.'

In the film, Emilia's character Kate finds work as Santa's elf for a department store and unexpectedly finds love with Tom, played by Henry Golding.

German photocall: Emilia posed alongside US director Paul Feig as the pair attended the photocall in Berlin

Matching: The Game Of Thrones star wore a pale blue co-ord that echoed the snowy billboard behind her at the event in Germany

It comes after the star discussed her recovery from the life-threatening aneurysm she first suffered in 2011, when she was just 24 years old.

Appearing on CBS Sunday Morning in April where she recalled the dark place she went to after her surgery, she shared images from her hospital stay, revealing the second aneurysm very nearly killed her.

Discussing the impact it had not just on her physical health but mental wellbeing, she revealed: 'The first time it was difficult, with the second one I found it much harder to stay optimistic.

Joking around: Director Paul Feig posed with his hands in the shape of a peace sign as he cosied up to Emilia on the red carpet

'[I coped with it as a] a day to day thing. I definitely went through a period of being... down - putting it mildly.'

Emilia explained that when a part of your brain is starved of blood for more than a minute it dies, which is what happened to her after her second aneurysm.

Last Christmas hits cinemas November 7.
